activities._tips: Bring a camera for beautiful scenery.

activities._tips: Make a reservation for a window seat.

activities.description: Check-in at the Grand Travel Hotel.
activities.address: City Trust Travel and Tour, Barnes Avenue, Adabraka, Accra, Korle-Klottey Municipal District, Greater Accra Region, Ghana

response.title: 7-Day London Itinerary

activities.description: Arrive at Heathrow Airport and take the Heathrow Express to Paddington Station.
activities.address: Holiday Inn Express London Heathrow T4, 1, Swindon Road, London Borough of Hillingdon, London, Greater London, England, TW6 3FJ, United Kingdom
activities.venue_name: Holiday Inn Express London Heathrow T4
activities._tips: Book tickets in advance for better rates.

activities.description: Check-in at the hotel and freshen up.
activities.address: 123 Victoria St, Westminster, London SW1E 6DE, UK
activities._tips: Ask for a room with a view of the city.

activities.description: Explore the Houses of Parliament and Big Ben.
activities.address: Colville Houses, Notting Hill, Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea, London, Greater London, England, W11 1JB, United Kingdom
activities._tips: Book a guided tour for a deeper insight.

activities.description: Visit Buckingham Palace and watch the Changing of the Guard ceremony.
activities.address: Buckingham Palace, Buckingham Gate, Victoria, London, Greater London, England, SW1A 1AA, United Kingdom
activities._tips: Check the schedule for the ceremony times.

activities.description: Lunch at The Goring Dining Room.
activities.address: The Goring, 15 Beeston Pl, London SW1W 0JW, UK

activities.description: Dinner at Skylon, located in the Royal Festival Hall.
activities.address: Skylon, The Queen's Walk, South Bank, Waterloo, London Borough of Lambeth, London, Greater London, England, SE1 8XX, United Kingdom
activities._tips: Reserve a table by the window.

activities.description: Stroll along the South Bank and enjoy views of the Thames.
activities.address: South Bank, Waterloo, London Borough of Lambeth, London, Greater London, England, SE1 9PZ, United Kingdom

warnings: ⚠️ Consider closer venues: Holiday Inn Express London Heathrow T4 and The Grosvenor Hotel are 4.4km apart in same time slot
⚠️ Long distance: The Grosvenor Hotel → Colville Houses (20.0km)
⚠️ Consider closer venues: The Grosvenor Hotel and Colville Houses are 20.0km apart in same time slot
⚠️ Consider closer venues: Colville Houses and Buckingham Palace are 4.6km apart in same time slot

segments.from: Holiday Inn Express London Heathrow T4

quickTips: Book attractions in advance to avoid long lines.
Use an Oyster card for easy travel on public transport.
Carry an umbrella as London weather can be unpredictable.
